nodes.text: The DL-19C blaster pistol was a model of blaster pistol manufactured by BlasTech Industries. Equipped with a stun setting, it was available during the Galactic Civil War and cost 450 credits. Unlike its predecessor, the extremely popular and successful DL-18 blaster pistol, the DL-19C was designed as a specalized and highly adjustable weapon aimed at a much more niche market.

The weapon was designed for weapon hobbyists, perfectionists and other individuals who were interested in being able to adjust every aspect of a weapon to their personal tastes. Adjustable aspects included the sensitivity of the trigger, the energy outflow from charge pack, and the shape of the barrel.
Produced in limited numbers, discerning fire-arm enthusiasts often used ownership of a DL-19Cs as a signal to recognize others of their ilk.
The DL-19C blaster pistol was first mentioned in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying supplement Special Modifications, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games.
